title: [Self-Directed] Comparative Method-Based Enhanced Understanding of Chinese Character Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of at least 100 basic Chinese characters and understanding of radical concepts
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based learning materials and iterative learning feedback centered on formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish 20 similar Chinese characters with 80% accuracy by comparing commonalities in their components (form, meaning, sound).
Learners can explain at least three differences between easily confused Chinese characters (e.g., 问-間, 左-叉) using a comparative method.
Learners achieve at least 75% proficiency in applying concepts in practical contexts by writing sentences using Chinese characters in formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
